search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LeadSimple (leadsimple.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for LeadSimple is located at: [https://www.leadsimple.com/pricing](https://www.leadsimple.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.
